ing: 1 head cauliflower, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 (12 ounce) box vanilla wafer cookies (such as NillaÂ®), crushed very fine
des: "I grew up eating cauliflower this way. In college, I included this in my menu for our school restaurant. Our chef did not want to allow me to serve it. Not only did we serve it, but almost every patron asked for the recipe! Chef even apologized to me after he tasted it! This is a great way to get kids to eat cauliflower (and grown-ups too)!"
ins:
Place cut cauliflower in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil and cook until just fork tender, about 10 minutes; drain and transfer to a bowl.
Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat; add cooked cauliflower and vanilla wafer crumbs and stir until evenly coated.
